definitions.definition: that you are trying to achieve or reach

examples.text: The intended victims were selected because they seemed vulnerable.
We got lost and ended up miles away from our intended destination.

definitions.sensetop: intended for somebody/somethingintended as somethingintended to be/do something

examples.text: The book is intended for children.
The rooms were intended for use as laboratories.
The notes are intended as an introduction to the course.
This list is not intended to be a complete catalogue.
The bomb was probably intended for a well-known human rights campaigner.
It was thought that the bomb might have been intended for a visiting MP.
The planned pipeline is intended to provide the country with 30 billion cubic metres of gas.
